contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Blake''' may refer to: *[[Robert Blake (actor)]] (born 1933), American actor, accused of murdering his wife *[[Robert O. Blake]] (born 1921), American ambassador *[[Robert O. Blake, Jr.]], his son, American ambassador *[[Robert Blake (MP)]], Member of Parliament for [[Calne (UK Parliament constituency)|Calne]] *[[Robert Blake (admiral)]] (1599–1657), English naval commander *[[Robert Blake (Medal of Honor)]], first African-American to receive the Medal of Honor *[[Robert Blake, Baron Blake]] (1916–2003), British historian *[[Robert Pierpont Blake]] (1886–1950), American Byzantist and Orientalist *[[Robert Blake (dentist)]] (1772–1822), Irish dentist *[[Robert Blake (folk singer)]], American folk singer *[[Robert R. Blake]] (1918–2004), American management theoretician, developer of the Managerial Grid Model *[[Robert Harrison Blake]], a character based on Robert Bloch from H. P. Lovecraft's short story "The Haunter of the Dark" *[[Bob Blake (ice hockey)]] (1914–2008), American ice hockey player *[[Rob Blake]] (born 1969), Canadian ice hockey player *[[Bobby Blake]] (born 1958), African American pornographic actor *[[Robbie Blake]] (born 1976), English footballer *Robert Blake, a character from Bungie Studios' computer game ''[[Marathon 2: Durandal]]'' *Robert Blake, brother to poet [[William Blake]], whom William claimed visited him in his dreams *Bob Blake, a character in a series African American westerns from the 1930s played by [[Herb Jeffries]] {{hndis|Blake, Robert}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Blake, Robert}}
